idea-plugin.name: picoEdge AI-Tools
idea-plugin.description:
Enhances IntelliJ-based IDEs with advanced file handling actions in the Project view context menu:
  • Copy Contents: Copies the contents of selected files and directories (recursively) to the clipboard, formatted with file headers and language-specific code blocks, customizable with prefix and suffix text via a project-level .env file.
  • Paste Contents: Parses clipboard content in the same format and creates or updates files in the selected directory, maintaining a .latest version for diff tracking.
  • Copy Diff: Generates diffs of selected files against their latest .old or .latest version in patch-package format, with customizable prefix and suffix text.
  • Paste Diff: Applies diffs from the clipboard to create or update files, storing a .latest version for future diffs.
Supports configuration via a .env file for file extensions, prefix/suffix text, and diff-specific settings, with intelligent binary file detection for .astro files.
